channel.title: HELP ME PLOX! Preventing Cheat Client From Connecting!
channel.description:
Hello Guys! I have just started a server based on PVP Evolution which is a 317 Delta and recently there are many noobs getting on my server using Cheat Client and Moving NPCs around, Exploiting etc. I would want to prevent this from happening and I tried following this tutorial http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,444519.0.html but I got this error when trying to connect to the server
[img]http://img407.imageshack.us/img407/4786/error1z.png[/img]
as you can see it simply block out everyone from connecting.
Note: I did not mistype the UID, they matches on Client side and Server side.
Can Someone help me with this? Thank You
Yours Sincerely MightyBean

item.title: HELP ME PLOX! Preventing Cheat Client From Connecting!
item.dc:creator: @Mighty_Bean Mighty Bean
item.description:
@Mighty_Bean wrote:

Yes, I am 100% Sure that I have that with the correct UID, client and everything compiledâ€¦

Read full topic

item.title: HELP ME PLOX! Preventing Cheat Client From Connecting!
item.dc:creator: @Sir_Jay Sir Jay
item.description:
@Sir_Jay wrote:

if (UID != #) { disconnected = true; destruct(); }
Is vital, make sure you have that with the correct UID, client and everything compiled.

Read full topic
item.source: HELP ME PLOX! Preventing Cheat Client From Connecting!
